CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 29, 1955, page 12, reads: "Happy 21st Birthday - When dimpled Bonnie Dudley became 21 last week, her charming mother, Mary Dee, gave her a gay party with just twenty-one guests to have fun. Pictured here is Bonnie, who also appears on her mother's daily show via WHOD, surrounded by her guests, left to right, first row: Bobby West, Frances Gray, James Pennington, Bonnie Muriee Jackson, Vonnie Micklos [Nicklos], Roosevelt Perry and Jackie Smith. Second row: Gloria Palmer, Dickie Hawkins, Jean Nicklos, Woody Douglas, Lawrence Miller, Doris Miller, Lolene and Kenneth Anderson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group, first row from left: Bobby West, Frances Gray, James Pennington, Bonnie Dudley, Bonnie Muriee Jackson, Vonnie Nicklos, Roosevelt Perry, Jackie Smith; second row: Gloria Palmer, Dickie Hawkins, Jean Nicklos, Woody Douglas, Lawrence Miller, Doris Miller, Lolene Anderson, and Kenneth Anderson, gathered for Dudley's 21st Birthday in living room
